Package com.moomoohk.Grame.Core

Contains the core classes of the engine.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MainGrameClass  
    Render
    Objects to render Grids.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorLayer
    ColorLayers provide an easy way to implement a color matrix.
    Coordinates
    This class massively simplifies the way coordinates are processed.
    CrashManager
    Manages crashes and exceptions.
    EngineState
    Represents the state of the engine.
    GrameManager
    The Grame Manager takes care of all the internal Grame operations.
    GrameManager.MainMenu  
    GrameManager.MainMenu.LoadGamePanel  
    GrameManager.MainMenu.MenuButton  
    GrameManager.MainMenu.MenuPanel  
    GrameManager.MainMenu.SaveGamePanel  
    GrameObject
    Grame Objects are objects which are placed in Grids.
    GrameObjectLayer
    GrameObjectLayers provide an easy way to store GrameObjects.
    GrameUtils
    The Grame Utils class provides useful utilities.
    Grid
    Grids are the backbone of Grame.
    InputHandler
    Handles keyboard input.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GrameUtils.MessageLevel
    Used to denote print types.

Package com.moomoohk.Grame.Core Description

Contains the core classes of the engine.
Since:
